Articles.Content:
9 hours ago, TheSpacePotato said:

but we're not going to add support for it.

1 hour ago, theaveragepxtseryu said:

 

Just delete the _oblate cfg’s in kopernicusfiles.

>having tons of problems with jool

>can't get good looking screenshots

>all i have to do is remove a .cfg file

>mfw

28 minutes ago, theaveragepxtseryu said:

>having tons of problems with jool

>can't get good looking screenshots

>all i have to do is remove a .cfg file

>mfw

Could you maybe post or send me a screenshot from those atmospheric glitches?

Due to low memory, I can't get a picture, but basically the atmospheric glow acts up and goes way above the surface because of oblateness.

 

This makes the atmosphere look strange as the glow is going WAY above the "surface" of Jool.

It's been a while, and I've decided to put together a Data Dump number 5! Woo!

Spoiler

Mesmo from Iave

Phal and Mesmo

Naal from Trytho

Hypat from Illum (at periapsis)

Misma and Voon

Voon from one of its moons

The Kraken's Edge on Irmin

Oran from one of its moons

The All and The Creator

Mirn from Hesmin

Sulph and Mirn

Vesp and Mirn (Hesmin visible)

Blalo and its moons

Ilve and its moons

Aquel and 2 of its moons

Mesmo and its moons (Phal not visible)

Mesmo from Dolis

Mesmo from Velar

Mirn from Taythe

That last screenshot is actually a teaser of Taythe's new groundscattering too

Special thanks to @StarCrusher96 for the amazing mod!

Edited January 18, 2018 by TheSpacePotato

Speaking of the Kraken's Edge, anybody know the rough coordinates? i.e. longitude, as its apparently north-south rather than east-west

8 hours ago, Saltshaker said:

Speaking of the Kraken's Edge, anybody know the rough coordinates? i.e. longitude, as its apparently north-south rather than east-west

I don't know the coordinates, but I really don't think you need them. You can clearly see it from space

Excited to build an ISV Venture Star-esque craft to visit Pando- I mean Taythe.
This is quite a large expansion so I'm going to assume that it is big (>2GiB). Is there a recommended ram and graphics card size someone could give me?

5 hours ago, SSr48 said:

This is quite a large expansion so I'm going to assume that it is big (>2GiB). Is there a recommended ram and graphics card size someone could give me?

KSS is modular so you choose how big it gets. Keep in mind you'll always need KSS_Basic. 

requirements are mentioned here:

http://kerbal-star-systems.wikia.com/wiki/Installationguide

Edited January 20, 2018 by StarCrusher96

Hetoo fly -by

That's a very interesting little starship

Design from @TheSpacePotato

37 minutes ago, Saltshaker said:

That's a very interesting little starship

Thanks  I made it for exploring Kelnis. I made another one too for the Kerolon System.

I install the KSS mod "extended Kerbol system", most things work well, but Rheya, one of the moons of Voon, is totally black. I check the files and I am sure that they are complete. Could you help me with this problem?

3 hours ago, Transcendence said:

I install the KSS mod "extended Kerbol system", most things work well, but Rheya, one of the moons of Voon, is totally black. I check the files and I am sure that they are complete. Could you help me with this problem?

Can confirm. Rheya's bugged

36 minutes ago, TheSpacePotato said:

Can confirm. Rheya's bugged

Time warp a bit and check if its just Voon eclipsing it.

2 minutes ago, Saltshaker said:

Time warp a bit and check if its just Voon eclipsing it.

Already taken care of. At no point in time am I able to see Rheya's surface.
I can confirm that it is not caused by Voon's shadow...

Heh...Heh..

HETOO!

see it's funny because hetoo sounds like someone sneezing
Rheya will be fixed in 0.8.
@TheSpacePotato Can we get a better shot of your ship?  Profile view and stuff?
